pe:mcml.script:
local MainLogin = NPL.load('(gl)Mod/WorldShare/cellar/MainLogin/MainLogin.lua')
local page = document:GetPageCtrl() Mod.WorldShare.Store:Set('page/Mod.WorldShare.cellar.MainLogin.Register.Notice', page)
page.set_mode = function(m) page.cur_mode = m
page:Refresh(0.01) end
function is_active(kind, i) if kind == 'account' then if MainLogin.registerValidates.account[i] then return true else return false end elseif kind == 'phone' then if MainLogin.registerValidates.phone[i] then return true else return false end end
return true end
function get_mode() return page.cur_mode end
